snippet: The Occupy movement, whose members have been encamped outside HSBC's headquarters in Hong Kong for nine months, on Monday fended off a first legal bid by HSBC seeking to evict the protesters.
abstract: The Occupy movement, whose members have been encamped outside HSBC's headquarters in Hong Kong for nine months, on Monday fended off a first legal bid by HSBC seeking to evict the protesters.

headline.main: Occupy Hong Kong's Fate Now in a Court's Hands
headline.print_headline: Court Allows Occupy Hong Kong To Continue Its Protest, for Now
